column4: Don't worry, it's not ACTUALLY 16-18 hours. When a few drives are done, the others will finish faster.

I *guess* it's normal for the drives to be so slow. You're trying to copy several folders to several devices at once: this will cause a bottleneck. But don't worry, it should calm down after a few transfers are done
Perhaps it will take about ~12 hours.
Consider moving less files or less folders.
